articles.description: It may not be the resolution that anyone wants, but it will be a resolution.
articles.content:
DETROIT -- Theres a fair chance that well have a resolution to the interminable deadlock between Major League Baseball and its players union by Monday.
It may not be the resolution that anyone wants… [+3578 chars]
